about.name: Deekshith C
about.description: Experienced developer with a strong foundation in building dynamic and scalable web applications. Proficient in frontend frameworks with expertise in translating complex UI/UXndesigns into responsive, highperformance interfaces. Recently completed comprehensive trainingvin Full Stack Development, enhancing backend skills.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
description: User Registration & Authentication: Secure user sign-up and login system
Shopping Cart: Add products to the cart and proceed to checkout.
Order Management: Place orders, view order history, and track status.
Payment Integration: Support for popular payment gateways using Razor Pay.

projects.name: Weather App
description: Search Functionality: Integrated a real-time search bar to fetch weather data for any location worldwide using an external weather API.
Favorites Management: Enabled users to save and manage favorite locations for quick access to weather updates.
Recent Searches: Implemented a history of recent searches, allowing users to revisit previously searched locations effortlessly
Responsive Design: Designed and developed a fully responsive interface, ensuring seamless user experience across devices
